scripts.remove-out-folders: cd ../react && rimraf ./src && cd ../ && rimraf ./font && rimraf ./website/src/app/font && rimraf ./icons && cd ./website && rimraf ./icons-json.json && cd ../generate-icon-lib
scripts.copy-over-folders: cp -r src ../react/ && rimraf ./font/react && cp -r font ../ && cp -r font ../website/src/app/ && cp -r icons ../ && cp -r icons ../ && cp ./icons-json.json ../website/
scripts.generate-icons: npm run remove-helper-folders && node --loader ts-node/esm cli/index.ts && npm run font && npm run remove-out-folders && npm run copy-over-folders && npm run remove-helper-folders
